title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect solution to keep you warm and cozy during those chilly days and nights. 

With its sleek and stylish design, this ceramic portable heater fan is ETL certified and comes in a beautiful black color, adding a touch of elegance to any room. Measuring at just 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighing only 2.6 pounds, it's compact and lightweight, making it easy to move and place in any desired location. 

Featuring three modes - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - you can choose the perfect setting to suit your needs. Whether you want to warm up your space or simply circulate the air to create a comfortable environment, this heater has got you covered. 

Safety is a top priority, which is why this heater automatically turns off when it reaches a 45-degree angle, ensuring peace of mind and preventing any accidents. 

But that's not all - this space heater delivers heating in just 2 seconds, thanks to its PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element. Say goodbye to waiting around for warmth, as this heater quickly and efficiently heats up your space. 

Worried about noise? Well, worry no more! With a noise level below 45 dB, this heater operates quietly, allowing you to enjoy a peaceful and tranquil atmosphere. 

Not only is this heater practical and convenient, but it also comes with intuitive controls and a built-in thermostat, giving you complete control over the temperature. Plus, it's portable, so you can easily move it from room to room, ensuring warmth wherever you go. 

So why wait? Experience the comfort and convenience of the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat. Ideal for home, dorm, office, or kitchen use, this heater is the perfect companion to keep you warm and cozy all winter long.

Measuring at just 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighing only 2.6 pounds, this space heater is compact and lightweight, making it easy to move around and place wherever you need it most. But don't let its small size fool you - it packs a powerful punch.

Not only does this space heater prioritize safety, but it also delivers heating in just 2 seconds, thanks to its PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element. Say goodbye to waiting around for warmth - this heater will have you feeling cozy in no time.

Despite its powerful performance, this space heater operates quietly with a noise level below 45 dB, ensuring a peaceful and comfortable environment. You can focus on your work, study, or relaxation without any distractions.

With its ETL certification, you can trust that this space heater meets the highest safety standards. It's the perfect companion for those chilly winter days or when you need a little extra warmth in any season.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Choose the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat for efficient, safe, and reliable heating. Order yours today and experience the ultimate comfort and convenience this heater brings to your space.
